com.lavanya.web.controller

Class LendingDtoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.web.controller.LendingDtoController

  • @Controller
public class LendingDtoController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to LendingDto object.
    Author:
    lavanya

      • LendingDtoController

    • Method Detail

      • bookLending

        @PostMapping(value="/user/lendingToSave")
public java.lang.String bookLending(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                               LendingDto lendingDto)
        POST requests for /user/lendingToSave endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to communicate to the api module and save in database Lending object using the dto LendingDto.
        Parameters:
        lendingDto - is an instance of LendingDto and contains all data to transfer to Lending object that need to be saved.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        redirect to lending.html, a confirmation lending page.

      • showLendingConfirmation

        @GetMapping(value="/user/lending")
public java.lang.String showLendingConfirmation(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                    java.lang.Integer lendingDtoId,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /user/lending endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database the lending a user has just made in order to confirm that the process of a book lending has been made successfully. Data related to this lending are then passed to the model and displayed in the view "lending.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        lendingDtoId - id of the LendingDto object that has been just saved by user and that we wish to display all information.
        Returns:
        lending.html

      • showUserLendingsList

        @GetMapping(value="/user/lendings")
public java.lang.String showUserLendingsList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /user/lendings endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all lendings a authenticated user made and pass that list to the view "userDashboard.html"
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        userDashboard.html

      • getExtension

        @PostMapping(value="/user/lending/extendDate")
public java.lang.String getExtension(java.lang.Integer lendingDtoId,
                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /user/lending/extendDate endpoint. This controller-method is used to extend the return date by 4 weeks of a lending.
        Parameters:
        lendingDtoId - id of the LendingDto object which has its due date extended of 4 weeks.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        redirect to userDashboard.html, a confirmation lending page.
